EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
I gave you a call earlier, but wanted to follow up via email as well.
I know you previously expressed interest in seeing a WeWork location, so I wanted to extend a limited time special offer to you: 50% off your first 3 months at FiDi, Wall Street, Charging Bull, or Fulton Center.
I would love to have you come by for a tour and experience the community in person! Let me know a good day and time that works.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
{!User.Name} {!User.Email}
